SELECT * FROM ( -- 查询已回款的首次回款 SELECT * FROM ( -- 查询已回款 SELECT refund.F04 userId, refund.F09 refundStatus, DATE_FORMAT(refund.F10, '%Y-%m-%d') returnedmoneyDate, refund.F01 refundId FROM s62.t6251 finacing INNER JOIN s62.T6252 refund ON refund.F11 = finacing.F01 WHERE refund.F09 = 'YH' AND refund.F05 = '7001' ORDER BY refund.F04, refund.F10 ) hasReceivable GROUP BY hasReceivable.userId UNION ALL -- 查询未回未的预计首次回款 SELECT * FROM ( -- 查询未回款 SELECT refund.F04 userId, refund.F09 refundStatus, refund.F08 returnedmoneyDate, refund.F01 refundId FROM s62.t6251 finacing INNER JOIN s62.T6252 refund ON refund.F11 = finacing.F01 WHERE refund.F09 = 'WH' AND refund.F05 = '7001' ORDER BY refund.F04, refund.F08 ) receivable GROUP BY receivable.userId ) returnedmoney
AND returnedmoney.returnedmoneyDate >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND returnedmoney.returnedmoneyDate <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT u.F04 phonenum, userbase.F02 realname, CONCAT(refund.returnedmoneyDate, bid.F03) loanTitle, refund.F07 principal, ( CASE WHEN bid.F09 = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 2 END ) loanDeadlineType, ( CASE WHEN bid.F09 = 0 THEN bid.F32 ELSE bid.F09 END ) loanDeadline, refund.returnedmoneyDate shouldReturnDate, ( CASE WHEN refund.F09 = 'YH' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END ) STATUS, IFNULL(bid_record.userInvestSum, 0) investingAmount, account.balance FROM s62.t6230 bid INNER JOIN s62.T6250 tender ON tender.F02 = bid.F01 INNER JOIN s61.t6110 u ON u.F01 = tender.F03 INNER JOIN s61.t6141 userbase ON userbase.F01 = u.F01 INNER JOIN s62.t6251 finacing ON finacing.F11 = tender.F01 INNER JOIN ( SELECT refund.F08 returnedmoneyDate, refund.F07, refund.F09, refund.F11 FROM s62.T6252 refund
refund.F09 = 'WH' AND refund.F05 = '7001'
UNION ALL SELECT DATE_FORMAT((refund.F10),'%Y-%m-%d') returnedmoneyDate, refund.F07, refund.F09, refund.F11 FROM s62.T6252 refund
